channel.title: Changelogs on Fluid Player Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Changelogs on Fluid Player Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: 2.3.0 Pull #192 Persist user settings across pages for volume, speed, quality and theatre mode Pull #194 Fix for play event on video click for certain devices Pull #193 Option to set adText and adTextPosition on a per ad basis Pull #184 Fix for thumbnails appearing incorrectly on mobile Pull #181 Fix for poster image for dash file Pull #195 Loading icon while player is waiting Pull #200 Ad text positioning fix Pull #196 Fix for issue causing controls to hide incorrectly Pull #191 Scrubbing to no longer trigger Fluid on.
